Cell.EditorialNote: This class needs to be replaced by CL or GO.
Comment: We are restricting ourselves to cells that are in the nervous system or closely associated with nervous system cells
muscle cells.  A more complete ontology of Cell Types is available through OBO.  Eventually
Cell.Definition: The basic structural and functional unit of all organisms. Includes the plasma membrane and any external encapsulating structures such as the cell wall and cell envelope (Gene Ontology).
